title: Ballet with Edward Villella
creator_credit: William Francisco, Robert Saudek and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Edward Villella, lead dancer with the New York City Ballet, dissolves the notion that male dancers are ‘sissified’ in a montage of dances demonstrating the muscular control necessary in his art. Shows how the body is made into a smoothly working organism while expressing ideas and feelings. Includes excerpts from NYC Ballet productions.
